bibl.title: "Palaestina" vs. "Arabia" in the Byzantine Sources.
bibl.note: "The province of Palaestina experienced a number of territorial and administrative changes during the first eight or nine decades of the 4th century. If our analysis of P. Oxy. L, 3574 is correct, the document is evidence for only the earliest of these changes."
Mayerson Philip, "Palaestina" vs. "Arabia" in the Byzantine Sources.
